labels.name: build
labels.description: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies

labels.name: ci
labels.description: Changes to CI configuration files and scripts

labels.name: perf
labels.description: A code change that improves performance

labels.name: refactor
labels.description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature

labels.name: style
labels.description: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code

labels.name: test
labels.description: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests
